body_html:
The GPU convolution fusions are things we would remove given the time to do so, I see them as warts on fusion.

Fusion nodes are mostly intended for rather generic computations. If your hardware only has limited support for particular fusions, it makes sense to use something like CustomCall to represent the specific thing you have already pattern matched.
